## setCustomUVs() function

setCustomUVs is a function that allows you to set the UVs of a shape to a custom UV space with offsets.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setCustomUVs(rows: number, cols: number, offsetX?: number, offsetY?: number): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rows | number | The number of rows in the grid |
|  cols | number | The number of columns in the grid |
|  offsetX | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The offset the UVs in the X axis or the U axis |
|  offsetY | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The offset the UVs in the Y axis or the V axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

number\[\]

- Returns an array of Vector2s that represent the UVs for a grid of rows and columns
